attributes.action: Want a stop put to the proposed Traveller site in Osmaston Derby
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want a stop putting to the proposed Traveller site which is being proposed for Osmaston Derby as the Residents have already voted no on travellers in the area.  We want the money from the government to be stopped so the scheme doesn't go ahead.
